about_the_game:
A Glimpse into the Epic Saga

Dive into the legacy of your family's unyielding struggle against the Tyrant, a timeless force thirsting for ultimate power. The prologue is only part of the full game and is completely free.

Experience the harsh realities of a world twisted by the Tyrant's influence, where survival hinges on mastering combat, equipping yourself wisely, and confronting towering adversaries.

With a taste of the retro-inspired visuals and immersive gameplay, Tyrant's Realm : Prelude is just the beginning of an epic journey that awaits in the full game.

● Equip Yourself for Survival: In this unforgiving world, your gear is your lifeline. Discover lost knowledge, unlock advancements in armor and weaponry, and fortify yourself for the challenges that lie ahead.

● Master Soulslike Combat: Set yourself apart from mere adventurers through intricate combat mechanics. Employ strategic prowess, precise timing, and a touch of luck as you strive to fulfill your family's destiny and topple the Tyrant.

● Face the Foes That Await: Traverse vast environments teeming with formidable adversaries and towering bosses, each bent on your demise by any means necessary.

● Immerse Yourself in Retro-Inspired Visuals: Tyrant's Realm combines retro aesthetics with captivating visuals that pull you into its world – if you can survive the relentless onslaught.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game player will defeat enemies using medieval melee weapons.

name: Tyrant's Realm: Prelude Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4096 VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 (8 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 Super (6144VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Enter a dark fantasy world fraught with danger in Tyrant's Realm: Prelude. Equip unique weapons and armor, face perilous challenges inspired by souls-like gameplay. Can you survive?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
